originalText.text:
Every style in white ü§çüñ§. Big thumbs up for the designer, if you are a lover of white or black you will find a huge collection of them here, sweaters, t shirts, pants, coats, rain coats, bags, trousers.
The staff were good, ambience is great with all the small lights.

originalText.text: Absolutely loved this store this is my favorite shopping place of all time and the other reviews are seriously lying. I did not once experience discomfort around security guards or any other people working as a person of colour. Infact the security guards were black so they really are not rascist at all. They didnt stop anyone from doing anything they did not follow anyone around the store or watch people. The people working are so sweet too and they let me take a bunch of stickers they talk to you and have an amazing attitude. Overall this was an amazing experience and I really hope everyone can see how nice it is.

originalText.text: Just speaking from my experience here, great selection of the clothes, the shop was laid out so beautifully! The security guard I had was fine. In my opinion the staff putting stuff away on the shopfloor were quite rude, if I said excuse me to get past them they wouldn't even acknowledge me and would just stride off. The woman at the changing rooms was nice enough but I did feel like the security was a little intense, I mean taking every item I had and unfolding them before giving them back. However the girl who served me at the check out Genevieve was so lovely and made me feel really welcome, even grabbing me something I'd forgot to pick up. Thanks Genevieve!! :)

originalText.text: I can‚Äôt understand how someone would want the image for their brand to be known for the worst customer service possible in retail. I went with my daughter shopping, several times throughout store was directly next to an employee and not once did anyone say anything even when pushing a clothing rack through a very over crowded store. The amount of people in the store, had to be a fire/safety hazard. The employees its hard to tell who works there theres no dress code and zero interaction even at checkout to ask how was it, did we find everything ok.

originalText.text:
All the girls works here are cute and hot, this review is nothing to do about them!!***
The fat and short security guy is very unprofessional. If you dress luxury stuff he would not even dare to talk to you, and if you dress down he will think you are thief. However everything is so cheap, no idea why would someone made such a cheap crime.
